overview: Directed by Anne Lise Ale and E.M.Z Camargo, “Valentina Versus” tells the heroic journey of Valentina, Joana, and Ariel. The girlfriends’ traditional RPG night turns into an epic battle when Valentina is persuaded to go to a party. Transporting the language of gamers to cinema, the film ventures into a fantastic universe while revealing that life can be an exciting journey.
title: Valentina Versus
